Itineraries.title: Sightseeing in Singapore
destinations: Marina Bay Sands, Gardens By The Bay

Itineraries.title: Singapore Adventure
destinations: Marina Bay Sands, Gardens By The Bay

Destinations.name: Marina Bay Sands
Destinations.notes: Iconic hotel with an infinity pool and stunning views of the city skyline. Open 24/7.
Gardens by the Bay', 'Futuristic park featuring Supertree Grove and Flower Dome conservatories. Open daily from 9 AM to 9 PM.
Sentosa Island', 'Fun-filled island resort with beaches, theme parks, and various attractions. Open daily from 10 AM to 7 PM.
